sentences.sContent: Everyone grumbled at the imposition of new taxes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Everyone grumbled at the imposition of new taxes.
sentences.sCn: 对征收新加的赋税人人都抱怨。

sentences.sContent: The ego is a false imposition of the I. When you say I that is the eternal you.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ego is a false imposition of the I. When you say I that is the eternal you.
sentences.sCn: 小我是对“我”的错误强加。当你说“我”，指的是不朽的你。

sentences.sContent: Remember Bamiyan Buddha being razed to the ground , imposition of Jajia, force able conversions done by Aurangzeb.
sentences.sContent_eng: Remember Bamiyan Buddha being razed to the ground , imposition of Jajia, force able conversions done by Aurangzeb.
sentences.sCn: 记得被夷为平地的巴米扬大佛吗，还有对非穆征收人头税，奥朗则布强迫皈依…

synos.tran: 征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担

remMethod.val: im(使…) ＋ pos(放置) ＋ ition → 强行放置 → 强加

words.tran: 欺骗（impose的过去分词）；把…强加于
